com.petpet.c3po.controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.petpet.c3po.controller.Controller

public class Controller
extends Object

A controller that manages the operations coming as input from the client applications. This class ties up the gathering, adaptation and consolidation of data. It acts as a facade of the core to the client applications.

Author:
Petar Petrov

          This constructors sets the persistence layer, initializes the processing queue and the LocalFileGatherer;

Controller

public Controller(Configurator config)
This constructors sets the persistence layer, initializes the processing queue and the LocalFileGatherer;

Parameters:
config - a configurator that holds application specific configs and can initialize the application.
Method Detail

processMetaData

public void processMetaData(Map<String,String> options)
                     throws C3POConfigurationException
This starts a gather-adapt-persist workflow, where all the needed components are configured and run. If the passed options are invalid an exception is thrown. The expected options are:
Constants.CNF_CONSOLIDATORS_COUNT - default 2
Constants.CNF_ADAPTORS_COUNT - default 4
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_NAME
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_LOCATION
Constants.OPT_INPUT_TYPE
and all other options that an adaptor might need. The adaptor will receive only options starting with c3po.adaptor and c3po.adaptor.[prefix]

Parameters:
options - a map of the application options.
Throws:
C3POConfigurationException - if the configuration is missing or invalid.

profile

public void profile(Map<String,Object> options)
             throws C3POConfigurationException
Generates a profile. The options include the following:
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_NAME
Constants.OPT_OUTPUT_LOCATION
Constants.OPT_INCLUDE_ELEMENTS
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_ALGORITHM
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_SIZE
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_PROPERTIES

Parameters:
options - the options to use.
Throws:
C3POConfigurationException - if the options are missing or wrong.

findSamples

public List<String> findSamples(Map<String,Object> options)
                         throws C3POConfigurationException
Finds sample records that are representative. The options include:
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_NAME
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_SIZE
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_ALGORITHM
Constants.OPT_SAMPLING_PROPERTIES

Parameters:
options - the options to use
Returns:
a list of sample identifiers.
Throws:
C3POConfigurationException - if the options are missing or wrong.

export

public void export(Map<String,Object> options)
            throws C3POConfigurationException
Exports the data in a CSV format. The options include the following:
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_NAME
Constants.OPT_OUTPUT_LOCATION

Parameters:
options - the options to use
Throws:
C3POConfigurationException - if the options are missing or wrong.

removeCollection

public void removeCollection(Map<String,Object> options)
                      throws C3POConfigurationException
Removes all elements for a given collection. The options include:
Constants.OPT_COLLECTION_NAME

Parameters:
options - the options to use.
Throws:
C3POConfigurationException - if the options are missing or invalid
